content.html: I sort of find it useful to look up people I'm going to be working with. See their background / experience. I don't post anything there or read what other people have written. But I think it is useful as an acceptable way to publish your CV.
content.value:
I sort of find it useful to look up people I'm going to be working with. See their background / experience.
I don't post anything there or read what other people have written.
But I think it is useful as an acceptable way to publish your CV.
